Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Chet Holmgren outscored Denver 21-17 in the third quarter.
OKC's defense limited the Nuggets to 17 points in the third quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Denver's bench struggled when reigning MVP Nikola Jokic wasn't on the court.
Denver coach Mike Malone raised the white flag with a little under two minutes as the visitors cruised to an impressive road win.
